column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Um yum! Can't believe I've lived in Chicago for 2.5 years and had never been here. We went for restaurant week and it was a great deal and we got to try a good variety. The bacon wrapped dates
column3: and short rib were amazing! The menu even included a glass of sangria
column4: can't beat that. Definitely want to come back and try more of the menu. Being that it's tapas
column5: it's a place you can revisit and have a totally different experience!
